constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Hogsmill Valley Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Discharge of Condition 5 (Facing materials), Condition 6 (Levels of buildings and pathways), Condition 7 (Waste and recycling), Condition 9 (Construction management plan), Condition 10 (CO2 emissions) and Condition 11 (Sustainable drainage strategy) of planning application 20/01085/FUL (Variation of Condition 4 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 19/01716/OUT (Allowed on Appeal APP/Z5630/W/19/3241782 - Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of new 3 storey residential building, plus basement to create x 8 flats with associated landscaping, bins and cycle store (outline application to consider appearance, layout and scale only.) for alterations to internal and external layouts) dated 24/07/2020
